src:
Mau Pulang Kampung Dulu, Simon McMenemy?
06 Nov 2019, 16:50 by Afif Farhan


Simon McMenemy (Rifkianto Nugroho/detikSport)

Jakarta - PSSI memecat pelatih Simon McMenemy. Mungkin, pria asal Skotlandia ini mau pulang kampung dulu ke tanah kelahirannya yang indah?PSSI mengumumkan berpisah dengan Simon di Instagram, Rabu (6/11/2019). Dalam pernyataanya, federasi mengatakan laga melawan Malaysia di matchday kelima Kualifikasi Piala Dunia 2022 Zona Asia, 19 November 2019, menjadi momen terakhir Simon membesut skuat Garuda.BACA JUGA: PSSI Pecat Simon McMenemyMelihat biodata dirinya, Simon McMenemy lahir di Aberdeen, Skotlandia pada 6 Desember 1977. Menariknya, Aberdeen sejatinya adalah destinasi wisata yang indah!


Simon McMenemy (Rifkianto Nugroho/detikSport)

Dirangkum detikcom dari website Visit Aberdeen, Aberdeen merupakan kota terbesar ketiga di Skotlandia. Kota yang berada di kawasan pesisir timur Skotlandia ini berjarak sekitar 2 jam dari Edinburgh (ibu kota negara Skotlandia) dan merupakan kota industri sejak abad pertengahan.Ada apa di Aberdeen?


Foto: (iStock)

Aberdeen punya 263 kastil yang bersejarah dan menawan, terang saja arsitekturnya masih terawat dengan baik. Sebut saja beberapa di antaranya seperti Slains Castle, Braemar Castle, Dunnottar Castle, dan masih banyak lagi. Kastil-kastilnya peninggalan dari abad ke-12.Bahkan, beberapa kastilnya dijadikan sebagai tempat penginapan untuk turis. Pasti jadi sensasi tersendiri, tidur di kastil bak raja!


Foto: (iStock)

BACA JUGA: Unicorn, Hewan Fantasi yang Dipuja SkotlandiaAberdeen menawarkan wisata golf, dengan 55 lapangan golf yang ciamik. Selain itu, juga terdapat 5 tempat bermain ski dan 8 perkebunan anggur.Soal wisata alam, turis yang datang ke Aberdeen pasti dibuat betah. Ada Taman Nasional Cairngorms yang lengkap dengan bentang danau, perbukitan, hingga deretan kastil. Sedikit berlayar dari pesisisr pantai, siap-siap bertemu lumba-lumba di lautan lepas!


Foto: (iStock)

Kalau bingung menentukan pilihan destinasi wisata, terdapat 12 tempat yang wajib didatangi turis di Aberdeen. Tempat-tempatnya yakni Katedral St Machar, university and King's College of Aberdeen, Brig o'Balgownie (merupakan jembatan tertua di Skotlandia), Tolbooth Museum at Castlegate, Duthie Park and David Welch Winter Gardens, Aberdeen Art Gallery, Provost Skene's House, Crathes Castle, Aberdeen Maritime Museum, Craigievar Castle, Balmoral Castle, dan Aberdeen International Youth Festival.Jadi bagaimana, mau pulang kampung dan liburan dulu, Simon McMenemy? Simak Video "Simon McMenemy Resmi Dipecat PSSI"[Gambas:Video 20detik](aff/aff)
text:
Do you want to go home in the past, Simon McMenemy?
Nov 6, 2019, 16:50 by Afif Farhan


Simon McMenemy (Rifkianto Nugroho / detikSport)

Jakarta - PSSI fired coach Simon McMenemy. Maybe, this Scottish man wants to go back to his hometown first to his beautiful homeland? PSSI announces separation from Simon on Instagram, Wednesday (11/06/2019). In its statement, the federation said the match against Malaysia on the fifth matchday of the 2022 World Cup Qualification Asian Zone, November 19, 2019, was the last moment that Simon made a Garuda squad. READ ALSO: PSSI Sacked Simon McMenemy 1977. Interestingly, Aberdeen is actually a beautiful tourist destination!


Simon McMenemy (Rifkianto Nugroho / detikSport)

Summarized from the Visit Aberdeen website, Aberdeen is the third largest city in Scotland. The city, located in the east coast of Scotland, is about 2 hours from Edinburgh (the capital of Scotland) and has been an industrial city since the Middle Ages. What is it in Aberdeen?


Photo: (iStock)

Aberdeen has 263 historic and charming castles, obviously the architecture is still well maintained. Just mention a few of them like Slains Castle, Braemar Castle, Dunnottar Castle, and many more. The castles are relics from the 12th century. In fact, some of the castles are used as tourist lodgings. It must be a sensation, sleeping in a castle like a king!


Photo: (iStock)

READ ALSO: Unicorns, Fantasy Animals Adored by ScotlandAberdeen offers golf tours, with 55 great golf courses. In addition, there are also 5 ski areas and 8 wineries. About natural attractions, tourists who come to Aberdeen must be made at home. There is the Cairngorms National Park, complete with lakes, hills and castles. A little sailing off the coast, get ready to meet dolphins in the high seas!


Photo: (iStock)

If you are confused about choosing a tourist destination, there are 12 places that must be visited by tourists in Aberdeen. The places are St Machar's Cathedral, University and King's College of Aberdeen, Brig o'Balgownie (the oldest bridge in Scotland), Tolbooth Museum at Castlegate, Duthie Park and David Welch Winter Gardens, Aberdeen Art Gallery, Skene's House Provost, Crathes Castle , Aberdeen Maritime Museum, Craigievar Castle, Balmoral Castle, and Aberdeen International Youth Festival. So how do you want to go home and have a vacation first, Simon McMenemy? Check out the video "Simon McMenemy Officially Fired PSSI" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (aff / aff)
